    Function reference

    Pairwise Differences & Basic Visualisations

    diff_histogram()
    Histogram of Grader Differences
    pairwise_diff()
    Helper function of pairwise_stats()
    pairwise_scatter()
    Pairwise Scatterplots (Continuous Traits)
    pairwise_heatmap()
    Pairwise Heatmaps (Discrete Traits)

    Summary Statistics

    human_device_aus_marbling()
    AMILSC Minimum Requirements Table (AUS-Marbling)
    human_device_ema()
    AMILSC Minimum Requirements Table (EMA)
    human_device_fat_colour()
    AMILSC Minimum Requirements Table (Fat Colour)
    human_device_meat_colour()
    AMILSC Minimum Requirements Table (Meat Colour)
    human_device_msa_marbling()
    AMILSC Minimum Requirements Table (MSA Marbling)
    pairwise_stats()
    Pairwise Statistics Table (continuous traits only!)
    threshold_diff()
    Specific Grader Difference Table / Bar Chart

    Other Statistical Visualisations

    pairwise_ccc()
    Pairwise CCC Radar Graph
    fleiss()
    Bar chart of category-wise Fleiss Kappa
    icc_device_comparison()
    ICC Line Chart over Time (Singular Device v Group of Expert Graders)
    icc_line()
    ICC3 and ICC3K Line Chart over Time
    extended_bac()
    Extended BAC Plot

    Within-Device Comparisons

    device_image_diff()
    Scatterplots of Device Image Differences (Continuous)
    device_image_diff_discrete()
    Heatmap of Device Image Differences (Discrete)
    device_image_comparison()
    Device Images Comparisons

    Data Processing

    merge_device_grader()
    Merges 2 dataframes (device and grader) into wide format
    merge_device_grader_long()
    Merges 2 data-frames (device and grader) into long format
    to_wide()
    Wide-formatted Data-frame
